title: What Are Your New Year's Resolutions? | Guest Host: Justin Barclay | 12/31/21
description:
CNN announce that cloth masks don’t work. School districts are going to continue their mask mandates for students. Justin Barclay sits down with Dr. Avery Jackson to discuss Covid and what you should do if you contract Covid. Charlie LeDuff and Justin discuss the research behind the vaccine and its severity against the virus. Government officials are once again playing politics, but this time with monoclonal antibodies. Justin sits with Ron from Stand Up Michigan to discuss a serious problem that Michigan is facing right now. Is there any hope? Justin Barclay listens to you and what your resolutions are in the New Year.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Talk show host Justin Barclay guest host the Glenn Beck Program.
